input.sentences: some of the buildings were magnificent .
the inside of the buildings had great architecture .
we went to the church that day .
everyone went on the rides before they left .
output.sentences: There was a large building on the side of the freeway.
Inside of the building there was an x on the ceiling.
Outside there was a beautifully designed street lamp.
On the top of the building there was a cross that looked like it would be on the top of a church.
Behind the building there was a carnival that had various fun rides.
